definition: lit. food and medicine come from the same source (idiom)/fig. there is no clear-cut distinction between food and medicine

sentences.english: In this article the regularity of amino acid replacement among homologues insulins was explored.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了同源胰岛素间氨基酸取代的规律性。

sentences.english: The whistlers propagating along these two different discrete paths have nearly the smae dispersion values.
sentences.chinese: 沿两条不同路径传播的同源哨声具有几乎相同的色散。

sentences.english: Autopolyploids are genetically isolated from their parental diploids .
sentences.chinese: 同源多倍体与其亲本二倍体在遗传上相隔离。

sentences.english: Bivalent Describing any pair of homologous chromosomes when they pair up during MEIOSIS.
sentences.chinese: 在减数分裂中配对时的任意一对同源染色体。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, it also deduces and links with some other paronyms.
sentences.chinese: 同时，考证中还推论系联了其他同源词。

sentences.english: The avirulence gene fragment is homologous in all races of the pathogen of Xoo.
sentences.chinese: 该无毒基因片断在此病原的不同小种中均有同源性。

sentences.english: It is an important content to analyze cognate words.
sentences.chinese: 分析同源词是《通雅》中的一个重要内容。

sentences.english: Application of Microsatellite DNA on Analyzing the Homology of Related Species in Juglans L.
sentences.chinese: 微卫星DNA在核桃属近缘种同源性分析上的应用。

sentences.english: It is The Chinese Medicinal and Edible culture models.
sentences.chinese: 也是中国药食同源文化的典型体现。

sentences.english: At last, we further analyzed the cognates in Shi Wen.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对《释文》同源词研究作进一步讨论。

sentences.english: Such cognate words don't necessarily mean the same.
sentences.chinese: 很必然地，这些原本的同源词看上去就并不相像了。

sentences.english: Each of the 46 chromosomes is a member of a homologous pair .
sentences.chinese: 46条染色体的每一条都是一个同源对的成员。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo verify the homology hypothesis of depression and insomnia.
sentences.chinese: 目的验证抑郁症和失眠症同源性假说。

sentences.english: The fine-grained diorite enclaves in granites and their host rocks come from the same magma source.
sentences.chinese: 花岗岩中的细粒闪长质包体与寄主岩石属于同源岩浆。

sentences.english: The former are considered to be homologous with the sepals of Ranunculus.
sentences.chinese: 普通认为，前者的花瓣与毛茛属植物花萼同源。

sentences.english: Homogeny is boring and limiting. Diversity begets a natural balance.
sentences.chinese: 同源生命是乏味和有限的，多样性才导致自然的平衡。

definition: to form a cohesive whole/to fuse together
to merge together (idiom); to unify disparate elements into one whole
the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
to evolve (of ideas, designs, constructions etc)/to develop and change
to make no distinction between what's one's own and what's another's (idiom)/to share everything/to be on very intimate terms
to grow and multiply without end
